jump_scares.spoiler: Roy grabs Kristen from behind as she tries to escape
A disfigured woman can briefly be seen during a lightning flash
Emily pops up in front of Kristen as she rifles through some files
The disfigured woman grabs Kristen around the neck while she is having a shower. [Video
A hand appears behind Kristen while she is hiding
The disfigured hand suddenly appears when Kristen looks in a morgue drawer. [Video
Kristen turns around and the ghost of Alice is standing right in front of her
Sarah looks in her pocket mirror and sees the ghost of Alice in the reflection
The ghost of Alice suddenly grabs Sarah from behind as she looks out a window
The ghost of Alice appears behind Emily and slashes her throat
The ghost of Alice appears behind Zoey while she is in the service lift
Kristen follows a trail of blood and then looks up to see Alice’s ghost standing in front of her
Kristen looks down the hallway and the camera follows. When the camera pans back, Alice’s ghost is standing behind her
After Dr Stringer finishes talking to Kristen, the ghost appears once more
Alice opens a cabinet above the sink and Kristen comes out and attacks her. [Video
